title: Drawing, "Design for a Centerpiece", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, yellow ink, yellow pastel (recto and verso), graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at center: PIECE DE MILIEU; at lower right: J.P./36/2x1; to right of centerpiece finial: VERMEIL SABLE; below: VERMEIL POLI; to right of centerpiece: VERMEIL POLI; below: VERMEIL SABLE; in blue color pencil at upper right: abou [---]
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Circular centerpiece drawn in plan and elevation decorated with applied alternating bands of polished and matte vermeil protruding beyond the body indicated in yellow pastel ending in a short flared foot set in a circular rounded-edge base. Cylindrical matte vermeil finial surmounted on a polished vermeil plate of intersecting rectangles with intersecting, similar motif repeated on upper rim. Underdrawing of tureen in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Centerpiece", ca. 1920–40.
ca. 1920–40. Pen and black ink, yellow ink, yellow pastel (recto and verso), graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-42.
